name: Plant Joy ASMR
description:
Tough day at work?  Are you tired? Would you like to just relax? Then you are in the right place!

Plant Joy ASMR is a Top-Down,  casual,  relaxing game. 

Features:
  • 14 levels - classic (daytime & nighttime) + challenges
  • various types of enemies
  • hub with level selection
  • relaxing music and calming sounds
  • keyboard and gamepad support
  • available in 2 languages (English, Polish)
  • free demo version
Credits:

Programming & Design by @AnnoyedParsley

Music & SFX obtained from MotionArray

Thanks to the following image authors from:

  • Flaticon: Flowicon, Vitaly Gorbachev, Freepik, Creartive, rizal2109, justicon, Smashicons, Aido Cervantes
  • Freepik: @babysofja, @orchidart, @macrovector
  • Itch.io: Delirious Steve
Developer's note:

The demo version is limited to the tutorial and the first level.  Progress from the demo version will be retained in the full version of the game, but when you have some progress in the full version, you will lose it when you start the demo.
